lines.text:
[Pontificating]
Peasants always like to see their masters well-dressed.
I'm sorry. You have to be patient with me as with an ill person.
An ill person who rejoices in his own illness.
Children belong to those who raise them.
I don't share a man with another woman - even if she's his wife.
I have no Hell to be afraid of... or a Heaven, I hope.
